name: One-Sec BulletHell
description:
Here is my game for LD41.

My 2 incompatible genres were “Bullet Hell” and “Turn Base”. 

Move with  mouse click.Attack enemies and evade the bullets.

This game is a little difficult, I hope you can enjoy it~~

Mac and Linux version are not tested.Sorry for that.

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/one-sec-bullet-hell
